channel.title: Ignore List
channel.description: My ignore list saves peoples' username on it until you close the client, you can logout and log back in, but if you close the client and re-load it, the ignore list is empty again, how can I fix it? I have checked the Ignore list saving and it's fine, compared to a working Ignore list. How can I fix it?

item.title: Ignore List
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

It’s definitely because of an error saving to the character files on logout/setting the ignore list strings upon login. You should check that it saves to the account when you logout and see why it isn’t loading on startup by comparing it to another server you are sure has the working ignore list and a similar base.

Read full topic

item.title: Ignore List
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

More then just 1 thing to a ignore list.
Also compare it to your friends list.
OR it mite be courropted in spelling, or the loading

Read full topic
